pleaseChangeYourLightningAddressUpdateAn: Please update your Lightning Address and try again
lightningAddressGeneralHint:
Lightning addresses allow you to send and receive Bitcoin between users. On Gathr, use it for tips, donations, and more!

For more info, including a setup guide, visit: [gathr.gives/lightning](https://gathr.gives/lightning)
communityLightningAddressHint:
A Community Lightning address allows listings within your community to receive Bitcoin for tips and donations.

- All donations for monetary listings within your community will go to this address.
- Once set, it cannot be changed.
- The community owner is responsible for distributing the donation money to each listing creator.

For more info, visit: [gathr.gives/lightning](https://gathr.gives/lightning)

youWillReceiveNotification:
This section lets you test push notifications to ensure everything is working properly.

A test notification will be sent to your device to confirm that notifications are set up correctly. Be sure the “Profile” toggle is turned on before sending.
whichLightingWalletShouldIChoose: Which Lighting Wallet Should I Choose?
howDoYouSendTipsonGathr: How Do You Send Tips on Gathr?
whatIsALightningAppAnswer:
A Lightning app is a digital wallet that lets you send and receive small amounts of Bitcoin quickly, almost no fees, using the Lightning Network. 

On Gathr, your lighting app is used to send tips or Bitcoin donations to others. Also, when you set one up (like Wallet of Satoshi or Phoenix), you’ll get a Lightning Address — kind of like an email for money. You can add it to your Gathr profile so others can easily tip and donate to you too!
whichLightingWalletShouldIChooseAnswer:
There’s no wrong choice — any Lightning wallet will work for sending tips, and we’re not affiliated with any of them. 

If you’re just getting started, we recommend Wallet of Satoshi or Phoenix. They’re both free, beginner-friendly, and take just a minute to set up. Once you’ve installed one, you can come back here and set it as your default wallet for tipping.
howDoYouSendTipsonGathrAnswer:
1. Tap the ⚡ icon on the user’s post that you’d like to tip. 

2. Enter the amount of SATs you want to send, then click “Pay.” 

3. Select your Lightning app, then tap “Open Wallet and Pay.” Your app will launch with the tip pre-filled. 

4. Just confirm the payment, and the tip will be sent instantly to their wallet. They’ll receive a notification once it’s sent!

areYouAnOrganizationThatHasProjects: Are you an Organization that has Projects?
areYouAnOrganizationThatHasProjectsDescr:
By enabling the project feature, you'll be able to invite people to create projects associated with your non-profit. Their account will be automatically verified under your organization details.

You will not be able to undo this action.
youHaveSuccessfullyEnabledTheProjectFeat: You have successfully enabled the project feature
inviteYourFirstProjectDescription: Spread your impact. Share this post with your network on other platforms!
bulkInviteYourProjectsDescription:
Import a CSV file with your project details

The details must include:
- The project’s name
- The email of the main contact detail

shareThisAppToOtherPeople:
Help grow the movement for good. Share Gathr with people outside the app so they can join and start making an impact too.

Tap the button below to open your sharing options and send an invite through your favorite apps or contacts.

Your feedback helps us improve Gathr and make it more useful for the community.
Tell us what didn't meet your expectations - big or small.
priceFeelsTooHigh: The subscription price feels too high for what I get.

doesntFit: Let us know if your reason doesn't fit one of the above.
sometimesTechGetInTheWay:
We understand that sometimes tech gets in the way — but your ability to support or receive help shouldn't be blocked by a glitch.

If you're having issues with the verification process, we can help you complete it manually.

We already have your documents — we’ll handle the rest and let you know once you’re verified.
